55 #define BITARRAY(name,size) \
56  bitarray_t name##_bitarray[((size)+7)>>3]
57

59  memset(name##_bitarray,0x00,sizeof(name##_bitarray))

71 #define BITARRAY_SIZE(name) \
72  ((sizeof(name##_bitarray)/sizeof(name##_bitarray[0]))<<3)
81 #define BITARRAY_GET(name,bit) \
82  ((unsigned)((name##_bitarray[((unsigned)(bit))>>3] & ((1<<(((unsigned)(bit))&0x07)))) > 0))
83 
84 
93 #define BITARRAY_SET(name,bit) \
94  name##_bitarray[((unsigned)(bit))>>3] |= (1<<(((unsigned)(bit))&0x07))
95 
102 #define BITARRAY_RESET(name,bit) \
103  name##_bitarray[((unsigned)(bit))>>3] &= ~(1<<(((unsigned)(bit))&0x07))
104 
111 #define BITARRAY_TOGGLE(name,bit) \
112  name##_bitarray[((unsigned)(bit))>>3] ^= (1<<(((unsigned)(bit))&0x07))

120 #define BITARRAY_SET_VALUE(name,bit,value) \
121  do{if((value) == 0){BITARRAY_RESET(name,bit);}else{BITARRAY_SET(name,bit);}}while(0)
